It all began 10 years ago, when on a hot sultry afternoon, I was taken by the bewitching effects of fruit, squeezed into pure perfection. It was an unparallel antidote to the fatigue that results from the unforgiving climate of our country. At Mania, we want to chase the feeling of flavorful fruit juices washing, hydrating & enriching every parched emotion of our mind, body, and soul. We pursue that experience to last every day.

THE ETHICS OF JUICING

Sprawled over an area of 8000 square meters, housing over hundred highly motivated employees, our plants in Moga and Jaitu, Punjab, strictly adhere to the principles of ethical juicing, which aims at achieving highest retention levels of...

Aroma. Taste. Freshness.

Rarely satisfied with our own best, we push ourselves to constantly change the game and never compromise on the two most important things: Quality & hygiene. The entire production process benefits from Next-Generation Technologies that guarantee the highest standards in both.

WE PACK GOODNESS

Hydrentials are packed using bottles and tetra packs that are lightweight, easy to open and airtight. So that every sip is packed with pure goodness.

WE CARE (CSR)

We believe in leaving this world better than we found it. With this thought in mind, we have mindfully worked towards providing nutrition for the not-so-privileged children.
